TASK 1:

The squareroot of 2 is 1.4142135623731.
To check: the squareroot squared equals 2
2 to the power of 0.2 equals 1.14869835499704.
Eulers number to the power of pi is equal to 23.1406926327793
Pi to the power of Eulers number is equal to 22.459157718361

TASK 2:

fgamma(1)=0.999999996451316 0!=1
fgamma(2)=0.999999996451316 1!=1
fgamma(3)=1.99999999290263 2!=2
fgamma(4)=5.99999997870789 3!=6
fgamma(5)=23.9999999148316 4!=24
fgamma(6)=119.999999574158 5!=120
fgamma(7)=719.999997444947 6!=720
fgamma(8)=5039.99998211463 7!=5040
fgamma(9)=40319.999856917 8!=40320
fgamma(10)=362880.000332397 9!=362880
